webdev.title: Web Development
webdev.desc: Custom websites (PHP, Python, JS) or WordPress solutions.
details_points: Defining business goals and objectives
Competitor analysis for effective blocks and services. Determining references.
Development and proposal of unique services and tools.
Creation of a multi-page multilingual website with a control panel, application forms, and feedback.
Modifications and refinements upon agreement with the client.
Creation and connection of a Telegram bot for operational request management (booking confirmation/cancellation), calendar and slot changes, and client email notifications.
Domain/hosting (server) setup, email sending tools connection, bot protection, and Captcha.
Creation of a mandatory banner for cookie consent compliance.
Full SEO setup for ideal Google indexing and high organic ranking. Social media sharing debugging.
Account creation and resource connection: Google Tag Manager, Google Console, GA4, Microsoft Clarity, Bing console.
webdev.guarantee: I provide a performance guarantee and 6 months of free technical support as a gift to all my clients
webdev.seo_title: Web Development in Slovakia | Custom Sites & E-commerce | White Eagles
webdev.seo_desc: Professional web development in Bratislava and Slovakia. Custom websites, e-shops, and corporate portals. 6-month support guarantee.
webdev.seo_keywords: web development Slovakia, website creation Bratislava, web developer, custom website, e-commerce, corporate site

Website media content management

Testing and fixing minor issues accompanying the main problem.
bugfix.seo_title: Website Bug Fixing & Maintenance | WordPress & PHP | White Eagles

bugfix.seo_keywords: website bug fix, website maintenance, wordpress support, fix php errors, site speed optimization

about.title: Web Development and Advertising for Business in Slovakia
about.years_sk: I have been living in Slovakia for over 6 years and have thoroughly studied the local market and its specifics.
about.knowledge: I know exactly what digital product to create and how to promote it for the maximum success of your business.
about.pride_title: Great Result without detailed Technical Specifications
about.pride_desc: Experience working with freelancers on the business side allowed me to identify the main pain point of cooperation: a large amount of time spent by company management writing a detailed technical specification to describe all business processes and expectations from the site. I never require a complex Technical Specification from the client and will propose the best solution for approval myself.
about.cta_text: Order a free consultation to discuss the project and receive a personal offer.

popup.title: Don't leave just yet!
popup.outro: Don't miss this opportunity! Click the button below, and I'll contact you immediately.

steps.success_stat: I completed 90% of complex projects within 15 working days

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Information about how we use cookies.
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to enhance your experience.
cookies.what_are_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.usage_text: We use cookies for analytics and marketing purposes:
cookies.ga4_desc: Used to distinguish users and analyze website traffic.
cookies.meta_desc: Used to track conversions from Facebook and Instagram ads.
cookies.clarity_desc: Used to analyze user behavior on the site (heatmaps, recordings).
cookies.management_text: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.
